definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

Tangshan prefecture level city in Hebei

Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau

sentences.english: Fourteen of us won't be flying to Tonks's parents'.
sentences.chinese: 我們十四個人並不都飛往唐克斯的父母家。

sentences.english: Aimin Tang is director of the China Scientific Development Research Center.
sentences.chinese: 唐愛民，中國科學發展研究中心主任。

sentences.english: The creation period of Early Literati Ci-poetry is from Early Tang to Middle Tang.
sentences.chinese: 從初唐至中唐，是早期文人詞創作的階段。

sentences.english: The remonstrating officials played an active social role on the political and cultural stages of the Middle Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 諫官是中唐政治和文化舞臺上活躍的社會角色之一。

sentences.english: The singer made his debut as Mozart's Don Giovanni.
sentences.chinese: 這位歌唱家初次登臺表演莫札特的唐喬凡尼。

sentences.english: He went to the clinic to get some drugs for free.
sentences.chinese: 唐大爺去了趟衛生所，拿了些藥，藥是免費的。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供養菩薩，唐，石窟壁畫，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: In Tang dynasty, the phenomenon of bureaucracy trading was becoming more serious.
sentences.chinese: 有唐一代，官員經商已成爲一個嚴重的社會問題。

sentences.english: Tangmou said that when she found that when the law on public security organs to the police.
sentences.chinese: 唐某稱，當她發現違法時，就向公安機關報警了。

sentences.english: Tang Kwok-hing and Li Yuan's son from the Taiyuan is the open-establishing themselves.
sentences.chinese: 而興唐的李淵父子便是從太原開基立業的。

sentences.english: Brian Hoskins, Senior Technical Evangelist, Emerging Business Team, Developer & Platform Evangelism, Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 唐海洋，開發平臺合作部，業務拓展經理，微軟。

sentences.english: Tang Ren took the pants unfolded rin.
sentences.chinese: 唐壬凜拿過褲子展開來看。

sentences.english: The highest calcium content is found in collard greens, mustard greens, spinach, and swiss chard.
sentences.chinese: 其中鈣含量最高的是甘藍菜，芥菜，菠菜和唐萵苣。

sentences.english: Please do not exclude Tangra Type Chinese Food.
sentences.chinese: 請不要忘了唐格拉風味的中國菜。

sentences.english: Don was deep in with the girl on his right.
sentences.chinese: 唐與他右邊的女孩在深入交談。

sentences.english: B: Yes, that's right. A: I'm just calling to introduce myself.
sentences.chinese: 我打電話是向您作自我介紹，我姓唐。

definition: surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Chang'an (ancient name of Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1]) capital of China during Tang Dynasty 唐朝[Tang2 chao2]/now 長安區|长安区[Chang2 an1 Qu1], a district of Xi'an
Li He (790-816), Tang poet and author of 南园十三首
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
